select count(booknum) cnt,sum(totalprice) tot from book join booklist on book.listnum= booklist.listnum where to_char(order_date,'yyyy')=to_char(add_months(sysdate,-12),'yyyy')

select (select sum(bookprice) from book left join (select detailnum dnum,sitenum from sitedetail) on detailnum=dnum right join(select endp-startp period,startp,endp,sitenum snum from promotionsite) on sitenum=snum left join ( select listnum lnum,order_date from booklist) on book.listnum=lnum where order_date <= endp and startp <=order_date) adsum , (select sum(bookprice) from book left join (select detailnum dnum,sitenum from sitedetail) on detailnum=dnum right join(select endp-startp period,startp,endp,sitenum snum from promotionsite) on sitenum=snum left join ( select listnum lnum,order_date from booklist) on book.listnum=lnum where order_date <=endp-period and startp-period <=order_date) nonadsum from dual

select sitelocal,sum(bookprice) sum from book left join booklist on book.listnum=booklist.listnum left join sitedetail on book.detailnum=sitedetail.detailnum left join campingsite on campingsite.sitenum=sitedetail.sitenum where order_date > add_months(sysdate,-12) GROUP BY sitelocal ORDER BY sum desc

select order_months,sum(bookprice) sum from book left join (select listnum lnum,to_char(order_date,'mm') order_months from booklist) on book.listnum=lnum left join sitedetail on book.detailnum=sitedetail.detailnum where order_months >= to_char(add_months(sysdate,-12),'mm') GROUP BY ROLLUP(order_months) ORDER BY order_months

select order_days,sum(bookprice) sum from book right join ( select listnum lnum,to_char(order_date,'d') order_days from booklist where order_date > add_months(sysdate,-12) ) on book.listnum=lnum left join sitedetail on book.detailnum=sitedetail.detailnum GROUP BY ROLLUP(order_days) ORDER BY order_days

select things,sum(bookprice) sum from book right join ( select listnum lnum from booklist where order_date > add_months(sysdate,-12) ) on book.listnum=lnum left join (select detailnum dnum,sitenum
,${keyword} things
from sitedetail) on detailnum=dnum left join (select sitenum snum
,${keyword} things
from campingsite) on sitenum=snum GROUP BY ROLLUP(things) ORDER BY things
